long_description: The top-of-the-line Kelty Pathfinder 3.0 child carrier is loaded with convenient features and offers the ultimate in comfort for you and your little hitchhiker. Premium features, such as a zip-off daypack, diaper-changing pad and secure leg straps for your child, elevate this child carrier to a new standard of convenience. Laminated, padded and contoured hipbelt and shoulder straps ensure carrying comfort; easy torso-length adjustment allows easy fitting changes between short and tall parents. Height-adjustable child cockpit features a padded, 5-point harness, toy loops and removable, washable chin pad; removable sunshade enhances comfort and protection. Lightweight aluminum frame and patented Auto-Deploy(TM) kickstand with no-pinch hinges provide a stable platform for loading and unloading your child. Front compartment, hipbelt pocket, side water bottle pocket and under-seat storage offer room for food, bottles and diapers. The Kelty Pathfinder 3.0 child carrier features a hydration-ready design that accommodates a reservoir and drink tube (sold separately).
short_description: The top-of-the-line Kelty Pathfinder 3.0 child carrier is loaded with convenient features and offers the ultimate in comfort for you and your little hitchhiker.
